content.raw:
To test this change, be sure to build and install the latest `example` controller:

~~~
cd build
make
sudo make install
cd ../example/build
make
sudo make install
gzserver worlds/fixed_simple_36.world --verbose
~~~

You should see GPS data from one robot, similar to:

~~~
[Msg] [192.168.2.1] lat long alt: 35.7753 -120.774 208.335
[Msg] [192.168.2.1] lat long alt: 35.7753 -120.774 208.339
[Msg] [192.168.2.1] lat long alt: 35.7753 -120.774 208.344
~~~
content.html:
To test this change, be sure to build and install the latest example controller:

cd build
make
sudo make install
cd ../example/build
make
sudo make install
gzserver worlds/fixed_simple_36.world --verbose

You should see GPS data from one robot, similar to:

[Msg] [192.168.2.1] lat long alt: 35.7753 -120.774 208.335
[Msg] [192.168.2.1] lat long alt: 35.7753 -120.774 208.339
[Msg] [192.168.2.1] lat long alt: 35.7753 -120.774 208.344
